name: notetakingapp
description: DAY1: We are going to focus on building the BE for our notes taking application with following features: - A new user should be able to register. - A registered user should be able to authenticate. - A user should be able to create a new note. - A user should be able view/his/her notes. - A user should be able update his/her notes. - A user should be able delete his/her notes.
